title: Customized Nursing Informatics Foundational Education by Proficiency Level

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A short intensive course for undergraduates offering personalized online instruction by proficiency level in real-time environments. Equipped with digital devices for practice-centered learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental concepts of nursing informatics (e.g., electronic medical records, health information systems)
Learners can analyze cases of information systems used in nursing practice to suggest improvements in work efficiency
Learners can practice creating electronic charts and managing data using an online platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
